content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters transferring coal at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) storing ore
- 2 Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5) transferring materials
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0) with associated inserters

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and inserters for ore collection
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Organized smelting array consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input inserters and chests above furnaces
- Output inserters and chests below furnaces
- Transport belt system for material movement

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=20-27)
Complete power setup with:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network distributing power

# ERROR TIPS

### Extraction errors
- Cannot extract from chests that are empty or don't contain the requested item
- Must be within reach distance of the target chest when attempting to extract

### Entity placement optimization
- Ensure proper spacing between entities to allow for inserter operation
- Consider direction of material flow when placing mining drills and furnaces

### Power system issues
- Ensure continuous fuel supply to boilers to maintain power generation
- Connect all electrical entities to the power network via electric poles

### Mining efficiency
- Keep mining drills fueled to prevent "out of fuel" status
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent backups in the production line

### Transport system
- Ensure proper belt connections between production stages
- Monitor inserter pickup and drop positions to maintain flow
